articles.title: Weather postpones White Sox-Guardians; DH set for Wednesday - MLB.com
articles.description:
CLEVELAND -- Punxsutawney Phil should’ve warned us we’d have more than six more weeks of winter.
For the second consecutive day, the Guardians and White Sox were forced to postpone their matchup for Tuesday night due to rain, snow, wind and cold temperatures.…
